tag_list: marketing, strategic-marketing, social-gaming, monetizacion, telecommunications, payments, digital-marketing, traditional-marketing, marketing-conferencist, business-model-generation
overview:
I am a passionate in Marketing. I have had the privilege of training myself within the Departments of Marketing, in Advisory Firms and at University. Personally, I consider myself a self-taught in many subjects. I specialize in Strategic (Traditional & Digital) Marketing from an integrated view.

Specialities -Strategic & Operative Marketing -Traditional & Digital Marketing + Social Media Marketing -Social Gaming Marketing & Monetization -Conferencist & Teacher -Business Model Generation -Strategic Direction -Business Intelligence & Finance. -Market & Desk research

Vertical Markets: Internet Social Gaming & Virtual goods Telecommunications Technology & Software Sports Consumer Goods Education Advisory Turism Finance and Payments Companies .

Degrees Acquired: -Public Accountant (Universidad de Buenos Aires, Argentina) -MBA (ITEAP, Spain) -Master in Strategy and Innovation Management (Universidad Aut. de Barcelona, Spain) -Posgraduate Programme in Business Intelligence (Universidad Austral, Argentina)
